title: Comment Section XSS Challenge
description: Exploit a stored XSS vulnerability in a blog platform's comment section.
hints: Look for places where user input is stored and displayed back.
Try injecting basic JavaScript payloads to see if they're executed.
Consider how you might use JavaScript to access document.cookie.
learningObjectives: Understand the impact of stored XSS vulnerabilities
Learn how to inject JavaScript payloads into input fields
Practice exploiting XSS to capture cookies using attacker-controlled scripts
